segments.text: Which school is your children in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is now in a private school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it costs too much . It's more expensive than the public school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's idea of my husband . He is always banging the drum for better schools .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the private school amount to better schools .
segments.speaker: S1
